description: Elon Musk hired a sophisticated lobbying team in Texas to push legislation favorable to his companies, successfully influencing multiple laws affecting SpaceX, Tesla, and X Corp.
notes: Comprehensive documentation of corporate lobbying mechanisms in 2025 Texas legislative session

sources.title: Elon Musk hired a dozen Texas lobbyists this year. State law keeps the extent of their influence under wraps
Want to know who Elon Musk's lobbyists wined and dined? It's a Texas-sized secret.
How changes to Texas law will help Elon Musk's companies

summary: Elon Musk deployed a sophisticated lobbying operation in Texas, hiring 12 lobbyists across SpaceX, Tesla, and X Corp. The team, including former advisors to Governor Greg Abbott, successfully influenced multiple legislative actions. They secured laws benefiting Musk's companies, including protections for SpaceX launch sites, drone restrictions, and business-friendly regulations, while exploiting Texas's weak lobbying transparency laws.
title: Musk's Lobbying Team Secures Sweeping Legislative Wins in Texas
